title: I'M FINALLY WATER COOLING! Threadripper Build Update!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Its FINALLY happening.  A full water cooled build for the Threadripper system has begun!   Check out the Corsair HydroX Config Tool:    Protect your financial identity online with Privacy.com & get $5 off your first purchase TOTALLY FREE!   Especially important for all those NordVPN customers.  ;)  Sign up at:      A VERY special thanks to Corsair for all their help in making this video possible.  They flew down to Bulgaria, provided two full days of consultation and provided all the water cooling components.  No monetary compensation from Corsair was received for this video.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  AMD Threadripper 2950X:   ASUS Zenith Alpha:   Dominator Platinum:   RoG RTX 2080 Ti STRIX:   MP510 2TB:   Corsair 680X:   LL140 Fans:   AX1000 PSU:    Subscribe     This video is sponsored by Privacy.com through a paid endorsement.    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- #watercooling #pcbuild #hardwarecanucks
